channel.title: No nk in the last game
channel.description: THIS GAME IS BROKEN #### What happened? Finished a game and there was no NK and 4 neutrals #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? THERE WERE SUPPOSED TO BE 1-3 NEUTS AND A NK #### Steps to reproduce: I DONT EVEN KNOW #### Comments: https://i.gyazo.com/4139f14f79824f48d4abc92d9f359099.jpg
